name: MAIN_BLOCK
code:
DATA lt_vbrk TYPE TABLE OF vbrk.
DATA lt_vbrp TYPE TABLE OF vbrp.
DATA lt_join TYPE TABLE OF vbrp.
DATA lt_join_ok TYPE TABLE OF vbrp.
DATA lt_mara TYPE TABLE OF mara.
SELECT * FROM vbrk INTO TABLE lt_vbrk.
SELECT * FROM vbrp INTO TABLE lt_vbrp WHERE vbrp~vbtyp = 'M'.
SELECT * FROM vbrk AS b INNER JOIN vbrp AS p ON b~vbeln = p~vbeln INTO TABLE lt_join.
SELECT * FROM vbrk AS b INNER JOIN vbrp AS p ON b~vbeln = p~vbeln WHERE b~draft = space AND p~draft = space INTO TABLE lt_join_ok.
SELECT * FROM mara INTO TABLE lt_mara.
